entry.sentence: `` Bravo , dear Griseldis !
entry.parse: (ROOT (FRAG (`` ``) (NP (NNP Bravo)) (, ,) (NP (NNP dear) (NNPS Griseldis)) (. !)))
entry.deps: root(ROOT-0, Bravo-2) nn(Griseldis-5, dear-4) dep(Bravo-2, Griseldis-5)

entry.sentence: Yes , I believe that you are the suitable personality for this post , believe that a kind destiny has led you here so that your steps are directed to Treuenfels Castle .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (INTJ (UH Yes)) (, ,) (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP believe) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP are) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ suitable) (NN personality)) (PP (IN for) (NP (DT this) (NN post)))) (, ,) (S (VP (VB believe) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (DT a) (NN kind) (NN destiny)) (VP (VBZ has) (VP (VBN led) (NP (PRP you)) (ADVP (ADVP (RB here) (RB so)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS steps)) (VP (VBP are) (VP (VBN directed) (PP (TO to) (NP (NNP Treuenfels) (NNP Castle)))))))))))))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: This is God 's providence , and he will know why he has arranged everything this way .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (DT This)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (NNP God) (POS 's)) (NN providence)))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (MD will) (VP (VB know) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB why)) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBZ has) (VP (VBN arranged) (NP (NP (NN everything)) (NP (DT this) (NN way)))))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: But now I will immediately send for your aunt , so that we can discuss everything with her .

entry.sentence: And then I want to write to Count Harro . ''

entry.sentence: She was not a little startled when she heard in whose house Griseldis was to take a position .

entry.sentence: She felt as if she must advise Griseldis against it .

entry.sentence: But at the same time she thought sorrowfully of the fact that in a few days Griseldis ' term at the monastery would have expired , and that she had not yet found another engagement .
